mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(memno, nickname, id, pw , phonenum, email, address, companyNo, birth, rank, name) values(memNo_seq.nextval, #{nickname}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{phonenum}, #{email}#{email2}, #{address}, #{companyNo}, #{birth}, #{rank}, #{name})
mapper.update: update member set nickname = #{nickname}, pw = #{pw}, phonenum = #{phonenum}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, companyNo = #{companyNo ,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where memno = #{memno}
mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
select count(*) from member where id = #{id}
